column4: can't connect to my wireless router. I get an authentication screen but but the connect button stays grayed out (know the password is correct) same machine (duel boot) connects easily when win 7 is running. Any help?
yes i have done that and deleted and re done several times no joy
all the fields are correctly inserted in?
i think so, i even saw a thread about inserting the routers mac address as the BSSID in IP v4 and that seemed to work for a time
yes password correct. I was hoping the updates to kernal image i got this AM would fix but nope
it is intermittent yesterday I had no problem connecting at home or at twwo other locations
will it run at next boot without me starting it?
wicd is way stabler, so if it works  normally you should be in heaven
no joy it connects but then disconnects and re connects every few seconds
happy that you helped yourself and found a solution, Nurses and Dads for the win
